IndexingMapMemoryThreshold

public static final String IndexingMapMemoryThreshold
Memory threshold for the LP indexing algorithm: spill in the map phase after memory fills up to this fraction. Setting is a value between > 0.0 and < 1.0;

See Also:
Constant Field Values

IndexingReduceMemoryThreshold

public static final String IndexingReduceMemoryThreshold
Memory threshold for the LP indexing algorithm: spill in the reduce phase after memory fills up to this fraction. Setting is a value between > 0.0 and < 1.0;

See Also:

MaxNDocsBeforeFlush

public static final String MaxNDocsBeforeFlush
In the LP indexing algorithm, maximum number of documents to process before forcing a flush, regardless of available memory.
